## Vector2.addToRef() method

Sets the "result" coordinates with the addition of the current Vector2 and the given one coordinates

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addToRef(otherVector: ReadOnlyVector2, result: Vector2): Vector2;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  otherVector | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines the other vector |
|  result | <code>Vector2</code> | defines the target vector |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector2`

the unmodified current Vector2
